title: Spring Boot
content: Takes an opinionated view of building Spring applications and gets you up and running as quickly as possible.

title: Spring Framework
content: Provides core support for dependency injection, transaction management, web apps, data access, messaging, and more.

title: Spring Cloud

title: Spring Cloud Data Flow

title: Spring Security
content: Protects your application with comprehensive and extensible authentication and authorization support.
